vulnerabilities.description: Statute allows agencies to pause deadlines by claiming requests are unclear
vulnerabilities.mechanism:
- Accept request during regular business hours
- No specific form required
- May ask for clarification if description unclear
- Begin processing as soon as practicable

### Phase 2: Processing
**Agency Actions:**
- Locate responsive records across relevant departments
- Review for applicable exemptions under Wis. Stat. § 19.36
- Redact exempt information while preserving maximum disclosure
- Calculate reproduction fees if copies requested

vulnerabilities.description: Fee structure can be weaponized to deter requests
vulnerabilities.mechanism:
- Wis. Stat. § 19.35: Access procedures and deadlines
  - Wis. Stat. § 19.36: Exemptions and limitations
  - Wis. Stat. § 19.37: Enforcement and attorney fees

### 2025 Legislative Updates
- **Wisconsin Act 16**: Updates effective August 13, 2025
- **Electronic Records**: Enhanced provisions for digital content including emails, chats, website content
- **Privacy Protections**: Updated exemptions balancing transparency with privacy
- **Compliance Guidance**: Wisconsin Department of Justice upd

vulnerabilities.description: Allows charging for technical work with subjective billing
vulnerabilities.mechanism: Can inflate costs by claiming simple requests require programming

vulnerabilities.description: Agencies can reject requests as too broad or vague
vulnerabilities.mechanism: Subjective interpretation allows denial of valid requests

vulnerabilities.description: Broad exemptions can be misapplied to withhold records
vulnerabilities.mechanism:
- Wis. Stat. § 19.32: Definitions and policy declaration
  - Wis. Stat. § 19.35: Access procedures and deadlines
  - Wis. Stat. § 19.36: Exemptions and limitations
  - Wis. Stat. § 19.37: Enforcement and attorney fees

### 2025 Legislative Updates
- **Wisconsin Act 16**: Updates effective August 13, 2025
- **Electronic Records**: Enhanced provisions for digital content including emails, chats, website content
- **Privacy Protections**: Updated exemptions balancing transparency with privacy
- *

vulnerabilities.description: Response deadline is subjective rather than fixed
